attributes.action: Legalise and Regulate and Tax Cannabis THC for ages 18+
attributes.additional_details:
Cannabis is harmfull but isnt Alcohol and Tobacco harmfull and cause cancer and kill 

Cannabis is medicinal and helps with lots of ailments like Epilepsy, ADHD, Autism ,pain ,cancer, Parkinson Disease ,Fatigue 

Cannabis is used by a huge chunk of the uk population and most use it for medical purposes and a smaller fraction use it for recreational purposes. 

legal cannabis would be a good idea economically it can also help police focus on other hard drugs which are killing citizens of the uk
attributes.background: Legalise Cannabis for ages 18+ and tax and regulate the market just like how USA and Canada is doing
